long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock your creativity with our intuitive Color Picker Extension! Whether you’re a designer, developer, or just someone who loves colors, this tool simplifies the process of selecting and saving colors from any webpage.

Features:

Easy Color Selection: Simply click on any part of a webpage to instantly grab the color you want. Our extension displays the hex code, RGB, and HSL values for easy reference.

Custom Color Palette: Save your favorite colors to a personalized palette for quick access. Organize and manage your colors effortlessly.

Copy & Share: Instantly copy color values to your clipboard or share your palette with friends and colleagues.

User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a sleek and minimalistic design that integrates seamlessly into your browsing experience.

Cross-Platform Compatibility: Use our extension on any website, making it perfect for web design, graphic design, or any creative project.

Elevate your design workflow with the Color Picker Extension and make color selection a breeze!
